content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. The clerk will please read a communication to 
the Senate from the President pro tempore (Mr. Hatch).
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
The legislative clerk read the following letter:

                                                      U.S. Senate,


                                        President pro tempore,

                                Washington, DC, November 15, 2017.
     To the Senate:
       Under the provisions of rule I, paragraph 3, of the 
     Standing Rules of the Senate, I hereby appoint the Honorable 
     John Boozman, a Senator from the State of Arkansas, to 
     perform the duties of the Chair.
                                                   Orrin G. Hatch,
                                            President pro tempore.

  Mr. BOOZMAN thereupon assumed the Chair as Acting President pro 
tempore.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

doc_title: APPOINTMENT OF ACTING PRESIDENT PRO TEMPORE
title: APPOINTMENT OF ACTING PRESIDENT PRO TEMPORE
